week_1.title: Week 1: The Authentication & Core Models Foundation
week_1.overview: By the end of this week, students will have built a secure and functional authentication system for a banking application. This includes a robust backend API for user registration and login, a reactive frontend for user interaction, and the foundational database models for accounts and transactions.
prerequisites: Root directory must contain frontend/, backend/, and a non-empty README.md.
stages: Project Scaffolding & Custom User Model: Initialize Django and Next.js projects. Create a custom user model in Django using email as the unique identifier.
User Registration & Login API Endpoints: Build secure API endpoints for user registration and token-based login using Django REST Framework.
Frontend Implementation: Develop registration/login forms in Next.js, manage global authentication state with React Context, and protect dashboard routes from unauthenticated access.

Core Banking Models & Protected API Endpoints: Define Account and Transaction models in Django and create a secure API endpoint that allows a logged-in user to view only their own account information.
